response.overview: Two girls who are friends from the childhood share their respective lives and dreams, but with the pass of the years one of them feels attracted by the other, hiding it by not finding the way to declare her. But when finally she decides express the love she feels, the situation turns tragedy when her best friend appears with a boy at her side, who exposes her condition to the high-school as humiliation and reprisal. Will triumph love above all?
response.title: Female
